description: Chen, 32, will be making her Olympic debut in Paris. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: Kayaker Stephenie Chen’s constant travel companion
title_page: Kayaker Stephenie Chen’s constant travel companion | The Straits Times
maintext:
The Baymax plush toy, a character from the Disney movie Big Hero 6, is a constant companion for kayaker Stephenie Chen whenever she goes overseas for races. She bought it on holiday eight years ago and always travels with it.
Chen, 32, is making her Olympic debut at the Paris Games. She said: “It’s something that is my extra pillow but also it’s just a comfort thing because every hotel bed in every country is different unless you stay at the same hotel every time. So it’s just nice to have something that is familiar.”
